medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
provenance: Alexis Rouart (2nd Vignier & Inada 1911, no. 217); Florine Langweil; Louis V. Ledoux (until 1948); Roland Koscherak (around 1948); Richard P. Gale (until 1974)
text: Poems depited here supposedly are Fujiwara Kōfū's waka poem and a poem by annonymous poets from Kokin wakashū, also influenced  several other stories from Noh plays.
title: Visual Parody of an Oxherder
